Got a lint warning here as `mActivity.getWindow()` is nullable so may need to add a null check.

Not on my side, it seems that checking for `mActivity != null` is enough. But I indeed have the issue with the condition just under that doesn't perform such a check. But in reality, it seems that window could be nullable in some rare cases (not here) - it's just that the `@Nullable` / `@NonNullable` annotation is missing in the Android source. Let's fix both conditions using https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/52088/commits/63a176aa678ea54ba7612d4ff843247c91317819
